verses.verse: Now <S%H8297>Sarai,<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%>'s <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> him <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3205>children.<s%> She had a <S%H8198>handmaid,<s%> an <S%H4713>Egyptian,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H1904>Hagar.<s%>

<S%H8297>Sarai<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H87>Abram,<s%> "See <S%H3068>now,<s%> Yahweh has restrained <S%H6113>me<s%> from <S%H3205>bearing.<s%> Please go <S%H935>in<s%> to my <S%H8198>handmaid.<s%> It <S%H194>may<s%> be that I will obtain <S%H1129>children<s%> by <S%H87>her.<s%>" Abram <S%H8085>listened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8297>Sarai.<s%>

<S%H8297>Sarai,<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%>'s <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1904>Hagar<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian,<s%> her <S%H8198>handmaid,<s%> <S%H7093>after<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> had <S%H3427>lived<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> her to <S%H87>Abram<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> to be his <S%H802>wife.<s%>

He went <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H1904>Hagar,<s%> and she <S%H2029>conceived.<s%> When she <S%H7200>saw<s%> that she had <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> her <S%H1404>mistress<s%> was <S%H7043>despised<s%> in her <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

<S%H8297>Sarai<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H87>Abram,<s%> "This <S%H2555>wrong<s%> is your <S%H5414>fault.<s%> I gave my <S%H8198>handmaid<s%> into your <S%H2436>bosom,<s%> and when she <S%H7200>saw<s%> that she had <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> I was <S%H7043>despised<s%> in her <S%H5869>eyes.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> judge between me and <S%H8199>you.<s%>"

But <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8297>Sarai,<s%> <S%H8198>"Behold,<s%> your maid is in your <S%H3027>hand.<s%> <S%H6213>Do<s%> to her whatever is good in <S%H2896>your<s%> <S%H8297>eyes.<s%>" Sarai dealt harshly <S%H6031>with<s%> <S%H1272>her,<s%> and she fled from her <S%H6440>face.<s%>

The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> found <S%H4672>her<s%> by a <S%H5869>fountain<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> by the <S%H5869>fountain<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H7793>Shur.<s%>

He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1904>"Hagar,<s%> <S%H8297>Sarai<s%>'s <S%H8198>handmaid,<s%> <S%H335>where<s%> did <S%H935>you<s%> come <S%H3212>from?<s%> Where are you going?" She <S%H559>said,<s%> "I am <S%H1272>fleeing<s%> from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of my <S%H1404>mistress<s%> <S%H8297>Sarai.<s%>"
The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7725>her,<s%> "Return to your <S%H1404>mistress,<s%> and <S%H6031>submit<s%> yourself under her <S%H3027>hands.<s%>"

The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7235>her,<s%> "I will greatly <S%H7235>multiply<s%> your <S%H2233>seed,<s%> that they will not be <S%H5608>numbered<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude.<s%>"

The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2009>her,<s%> "Behold, you are with <S%H2030>child,<s%> and will <S%H3205>bear<s%> a <S%H1121>son.<s%> You shall <S%H7121>call<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3458>Ishmael,<s%> because <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H8085>heard<s%> your <S%H6040>affliction.<s%>

He will be like a <S%H6501>wild<s%> <S%H120>donkey<s%> among <S%H3027>men.<s%> His hand will be against every <S%H3027>man,<s%> and every man's hand against <S%H7931>him.<s%> He will live <S%H6440>opposite<s%> all of his <S%H251>brothers.<s%>"

She <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> who <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H410>her,<s%> "You are a God who <S%H7210>sees,<s%>" for she <S%H559>said,<s%> "Have I even <S%H1988>stayed<s%> alive after <S%H7200>seeing<s%> <S%H310>him?<s%>"
Therefore the <S%H875>well<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H883>Beer<s%> Lahai <S%H6946>Roi.<s%> Behold, it is between Kadesh and <S%H1260>Bered.<s%>

<S%H1904>Hagar<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> for <S%H87>Abram.<s%> <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H1121>son,<s%> whom <S%H1904>Hagar<s%> <S%H3458>bore,<s%> Ishmael.
